install.name: Content - JNovaContact
install.author: Rob Porter
install.description: JQuery Contact plugin for J! 1.5 and com_contact.

param.name: response_html
param.default: Thank you for contacting us. We will reply to your inquiry shortly.
param.label: Thank-you message
param.description: The text that appears below the 'form submitted' header.

param.name: fade_in_time
param.label: jQuery FadeIn time
param.description: Fade in effect timing, in microseconds.

param.name: width_manual
param.label: Enable manually specified width
param.description: If this is set to 'yes', the form will use the width specified below.

param.name: width
param.label: Form width
param.description: Width of form in pixels (you may over-ride this in CSS)
